main event: A military aircraft reported sighting a close group of moving lights near Terre Haute, Indiana, on 1st February 1953.
interesting points: The lights changed color from red to blue, to green to yellow, and were estimated to be flying between 20,000 ft to 35,000 ft.
Searchlights from the St. Louis area appeared to be following the unidentified lights.
ATIC (Air Technical Intelligence Center) checked local aircraft but did not find any to account for the erratic lights.
The observing aircraft was 100 miles away from St. Louis, which may have influenced the changing color of the lights.
There was a request for information regarding a transport aircraft vanishing over the Atlantic area on February 3, 1953, seemingly linking it to the flying saucer scare.
witnesses: F. Pilot of a military aircraft
